name: Smoq Games 22 Pack Opener
description:
The great pack opening game from SmoqGames is finally on IOS!

Open countless awesome packs and lead your team to victory in online tournaments!
Play matches to win the best trophies! Buy cards from online transfer market to build the best squad!
Collect daily rewards to get great rewards!
Our programmers worked hard to give you the ability to experience exciting tournaments!

Download the game to:
● Open all kinds of packs!
● Play exciting online tournaments!
● Build your own football squad!
● Collect full collection of cards!
● Get daily rewards!
